scripts.up:dev: docker run --rm --name my-pmdapi --env HOST=host.docker.internal --env REDISPORT=6379 --env DBNAME=pmd_local --env USER=root --env PASS=12345 --env JWTSECRET=devSecret --rm -p 9000:9000/tcp mabutalid1/pmdapi:latest
scripts.up:test: docker run --name my-pmdapi --env HOST=pmd-test.cgn2g7z9tsvr.ap-southeast-1.rds.amazonaws.com --env REDISHOST=host.docker.internal --env REDISPORT=6379 --env DBNAME=PMD --env USER=admin --env PASS=Adminpassword --env JWTSECRET=devSecret --rm -p 9000:9000 mabutalid1/pmdapi:latest
scripts.up:prod: docker run --name my-pmdapi --env HOST=pmd.c1wubughhknd.ap-southeast-1.rds.amazonaws.com --env REDISHOST=host.docker.internal --env REDISPORT=6379 --env DBNAME=PMD --env USER=MarcoMasterAdmin --env PASS=Ohmaasura123 --env JWTSECRET=prodSecretAllTimecultivation --rm -p 9000:9000 mabutalid1/pmdapi:latest
scripts.docker:deploy: docker build . -t mabutalid1/pmdapi:latest && docker push mabutalid1/pmdapi:latest
